CVE-2018-17199.summary: In Apache HTTP Server 2.4 release 2.4.37 and prior, mod_session checks the session expiry time before decoding the session. This causes session expiry time to be ignored for mod_session_cookie sessions since the expiry time is loaded when the session is decoded.

CVE-2018-17189.summary: In Apache HTTP server versions 2.4.37 and prior, by sending request bodies in a slow loris way to plain resources, the h2 stream for that request unnecessarily occupied a server thread cleaning up that incoming data. This affects only HTTP/2 (mod_http2) connections.

CVE-2019-0190.summary: A bug exists in the way mod_ssl handled client renegotiations. A remote attacker could send a carefully crafted request that would cause mod_ssl to enter a loop leading to a denial of service. This bug can be only triggered with Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.37 when using OpenSSL version 1.1.1 or later, due to an interaction in changes to handling of renegotiation attempts.

CVE-2018-17189.summary: In Apache HTTP server versions 2.4.37 and prior, by sending request bodies in a slow loris way to plain resources, the h2 stream for that request unnecessarily occupied a server thread cleaning up that incoming data. This affects only HTTP/2 (mod_http2) connections.

CVE-2019-0190.summary: A bug exists in the way mod_ssl handled client renegotiations. A remote attacker could send a carefully crafted request that would cause mod_ssl to enter a loop leading to a denial of service. This bug can be only triggered with Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.37 when using OpenSSL version 1.1.1 or later, due to an interaction in changes to handling of renegotiation attempts.

http.title: VOXIT - IT with Personality
http.html:
This website uses of cookies to enhance browsing experience and provide additional functionality
VOXIT
  • Services
  • Projects
  • About
  • Clients
  • Contact

IT with Personality

We
offer bespoke IT support packages also offer adhoc support design bespoke websites build custom web applications

We design, develop, implement and maintain bespoke IT Support, web solutions and telephony for small to medium sized enterprises. We help businesses to grow by keeping them working and focused on their core operations.

Our Services

IT Support

IT drives modern business and sadly, things do go wrong occasionally. We can help you manage IT upgrades and failures; we can even handle the day-to-day maintenance as well.

Our team has a broad range of knowledge that they've gained from helping companies of all sizes. We are ready to help you, regardless of whether you're at the office or even out on the road.

Web Design

Updating and maintaining your website can be a full time job. Messing with code and fighting your CMS should be the last thing on your mind. VOXIT has the tools and the talent to get rid of the hassle and make updating your site fun and easy.

We work closely with our clients every step of the way to ensure that the entire process is affordable, stress free and meets all your requirements the first time around.

Consultancy

We have a wealth of knowledge and experience that means that we're experts when it comes to developing and implementing bespoke IT solutions. This gives you peace of mind and a cost effective, well-made solution.

We've got a combined experience of over 35 years in the IT & web industry. We'll help your business to grow by solving your IT issues quickly and efficiently.

Get in Touch

Recent Projects

Inventory Express

Bespoke Web App / Website Design / iPad App / API Development

After the success of their sister company LC Inventory Services, our client wanted to replicate their tried and tested business model and offer it to the public for the first time.

Inventory Express features an informative website, a bespoke web application, and a native iOS app, which allows letting agents and private landlords to carry out inventories themselves via the iPad app and create an informative PDF report.

We worked alongside their iOS Developer to design and build an API to create a intuitive iPad app, resulting in a seamless experience for their customers.

The STR Group

IT Support / Managed Exchange Server & Dedicated Servers / Hardware Installation

The STR Groups has been a client of VOXIT for over 10 years, and throughout our flourishing business relationship we've been responsible and key to their day to day operations.

We've built and managed dedicated servers, setup and supported their private email exchange server, sourced and installed hardware for their 100+ workforce, and handled general day to day support and IT maintenance.

Meet the Team

Scott Pinhorne

Scott founded VOXIT in 2007 and has a solid background in the ISP and Telecommunications sector. His biggest strength is problem solving, and enjoys magic, musicals, and gadgets.

Barry Gorman

As our Operations Manager Barry oversees our projects from start to finish. He prides himself on providing solutions that save our clients time and money, and enjoys DIY and cycling in his spare time.

Matthew Wright

Matt is our IT Support Engineer and has a wealth of knowledge for anything that has a power button (and most things without). He loves cycling, animals, and the great outdoors!

Jamie Bicknell

Jamie is our web developer. He has a distinct skill and wealth of knowledge of both server and client side coding. He enjoys movies, speed solving the Rubik's cube, and photography.

We continue to use VOXIT because we know and trust them and we are always sure to get a personal, friendly and professional service from them.

Lance Taylor - Redstation

I have to say I am very pleased with how easy it is and just how much of the website I am physically able to edit myself, way beyond expectations.

Rob Bartlett - Marine & Industrial Plastics Ltd

From day one the project management was completely taken care of allowing me to concentrate on my business. I was kept informed with progress with regular reviews throughout the entire development process.

Leanne Cleaver - LC Inventory Services

We have been working with Scott from VOXIT for over 10 years now and we can always count on him to be there when needed.

Richard Crawley - STR Recruitment

Business through the site has increased greatly since the improvements. It is now completely up to date and sharp without being too complex

Robert Wells - Librands

Barry and his team worked with great enthusiasm to a deadline and coped swimmingly with all the problems of changing host.

Rolf Soderlind - Absolut Writing

Voxit took over our IT maintenance in 2009 and they have since looked after all of our ever growing IT needs: from equipment to website development to ever changing work processes to the security of our systems. Everyone is always very helpful and quick to respond to our needs and we feel we are working with a partner with our own interests always being at the fore of any discussion and proposed solution.

Alain Tremorin - ACP Freight

VOXIT listened to what our requirements were, and found a very cost effective solution. Implementations was smooth, and teething problems dealt with as a priority. Great service!

Steve Jordan - SMR Bathrooms

The Parish Council commissioned VOXIT to redesign and upgrade its website and we're very pleased with the result. VOXIT's approach was helpful, flexible and imaginative and the advice we received on specific aspects was sound and much appreciated. We have received very positive feedback on our new website and I especially like the way its designed to make its ongoing maintenance very easy, even for this website novice!

Lisa Walker - Rowlands Castle Parish Council

Previous Next

Contact


Get in touch today!

We aim to reply to all messages sent to us within 24 hours of receiving them. If you have an urgent matter or simply wish to discuss your requirements over the phone please contact us on the number below.

  • support@voxit.co.uk
  • 01329 610006
  • Unit 3 Fareham Innovation Centre
    4 Meteor Way
    Lee-on-the-Solent
    Hampshire
    PO13 9FU

Want to keep updated with what the VOXIT team have been up to?
You should follow us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram!
